Thank you to all of our Administrative Assistants. We could not do it without you!
These people have been very dedicated since the start of the pandemic. We appreciate these people!
NPS Food Plan During School Closure
Food will be delivered to areas around the NPS district according to the following

div.p:
Welcome!
Thank you for visiting our webpage. You are encouraged to learn about and stay up-to-date on all things NPS through this webpage and the district social media accounts (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram). We are proud of our students and staff and consider it a privilege to work with families to provide the best education possible. As always, please contact us if you have questions.
Experience the Lion Pride!
Dr. Peg Mathis
Superintendent
